## AuthorizationRequestMessageBody type

AuthorizationRequestMessageBody is body for authorization request

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type AuthorizationRequestMessageBody = {
    callbackUrl: string;
    reason?: string;
    message?: string;
    did_doc?: JSONObject;
    scope: Array<ZeroKnowledgeProofRequest>;
};
```
**References:** [JSONObject](./polygonid-js-sdk.jsonobject.md), [ZeroKnowledgeProofRequest](./polygonid-js-sdk.zeroknowledgeproofrequest.md)
